description: Chelsea transfer rumours: Djordje Petrovic, Mike Penders
title: Chelsea transfer rumours: Djordje Petrovic, Mike Penders
title_page: Chelsea transfer rumours: Djordje Petrovic, Mike Penders - BBC Sport
maintext:
Chelsea are not expecting to sign a goalkeeper in the summer. Enzo Maresca will instead allow Djordje Petrovic, who is on loan with Strasbourg, and Mike Penders, who is joining from Genk, to challenge for the spot. (Telegraph - subscription required), external
Want more transfer news? Read Tuesday's full gossip column
